sentence: The reception lounge was inviting with a fire and sofas and in the morning free tea and coffee is served in the evening free wine
Console table near lobby offers fruit infused ice water
Reception staff concierges and management were loely and helpful and great to chat to
The reception manager and the concierge deserve special mention they was enthusiastic and helpful
We especially liked the happy hour in the evening when wine is served in the lobby
I would recommend this hotel and would definitely stay there again what makes it stand out is the positive attitude and friendliness of the staff on reception and throughout the hotel
Little touches like a cozy lobby with plenty of refreshing cold citrus flavored water is very welcoming free coffee tea too
Hotel room was good huge bed minibar useful for keeping water in which was even better when combined with ice from the machine just down the hall
Reception desk was staffed with great people
We also really liked some of the small touches at the hotel like the concierge desk water in the lobby and the nice toiletries in the bathroom
Also free coffee in the lobby in the morning
We were steps from the lobyWe had the best coffee at 60 every morning in the lobby
Big hotel therefore some patience is needed at the reception
Nothing fancy basic accommodation with nice location
Free coffee in AM in lobby
Cucumber lime water in lobby all day
Offer amenities continental breakfast no parking fee upgraded room decor etc
Lobby was very nice but the floor hallway look like they need some renovations
The hotel itself is average in terms of cleanliness and room accommodations

it is a huge let down walking into the lobby or the adjacent corridors and finding plastic sheeting and the very pleasant staff just stuck at desks in the middle but visually as a welcome it is hopeless

Fast forward to arrival day after driving for 4 hours I climb service steps to get to the lobby give them my name to check in and am told oh I guess no one called to tell you that the room you reserved has been eliminated during construction we do not have anything for you
The lobby has lots of complimentary drinks etc so

ProsFront desk staff pleasant Recently renovated romConsNobody out front when we arrived for the required valet parking or to help with luggage resulting in having to carry our luggage up some stairsMasive construction in lobby with tarps half up and dust everywhere not ideal when you are 6 months pregnantNew carpet smell in renovated room a little tough to deal withFire alarm going off randomly a couple timesThe worst part of the stay was when I took the elevator and had a construction worker make me get off at the 3rd floor to take the other elevator because he had to use the one I was in
Hotel lobby under construction
POSITIVEDID NOT LIKE BEING ABLE TO HEAR FAMILIES TALKING IN THE HALLWAY LOCATION EVERYTHING IS NEARBY DINING ROOM SERVICE
As it was we were ready by midday and no one had called about the jeans so we went down to reception to check out and to find out what was happening
The only con in the King size room there is on 24 inches of sink and space for toiletries
Excellent fodRecreation fee 22 was not sure what it was for since there was no pool or gym
They have wine in the lobby every evening

In addition of the city taxes they have a resort taxes such a joke when your view is literally your neighbors room but you will be delighted at check out with Urban fees for that they charge you for what is suppose to be complementary such as the coffee stand in the hallway or the wifi and those little things you could expect to be free in a hotel
Pity that the Hotel reception staff could not learn from the staff in the Restaurant area
But charging the urban facility fee separate from the room charge is a deceptive way to increase the cost of a room
We did not get to try out the restaurant but we definitely hung out in the lobby area for drinks at the bar each evening
In the mornings hot drinks are available from the lobby
in the restaurant and also used the gym front desk gives you a day pass across the street a couple of times
The 29 daily amenity fee for no amenities should be discontinued
Also there was a 29 night costs for amenities and we did not use any part of the hotel or fitness center
No tea and coffee facilities in room but available for a couple of hours each morning in lounge
Hotel is a good place to stay the 30 extra a day for amenities is a waste put the price in the room per night
